column1: '''''The Middle-Earth Trilogy''''', also known as the ''Colossal Trilogy'', is a trilogy of games by [[Level 9 Computing]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/level9.html The Middle-Earth Trilogy / The Colossal Trilogy] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref> Its consist the following games:
Later all names were changed and it was published as ''The Jewels of Darkness'' by [[wikipedia:Telecomsoft
column2: Rainbird Software]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://www.giantbomb.com/jewels-of-darkness/61-16044/ Jewels of Darkness] at Giantbomb (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref>
